name: americano
method:
Mix the ingredients directly in an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
Add a splash of Soda Water. Stir gently.
garnish: Garnish with half orange slice and a lemon zest.

name: negroni
method:
Pour all ingredients directly into chilled old fashioned glass filled with ice.
Stir gently.

name: cuba libre
method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

name: mojito
method:
Cut lime in 8-12 pieces after removing the edges and the white parts. Then mix the pieces with sugar and mint.

Add splash of soda water and fill the glass with ice.

Pour the rum and top with soda water. Light stir to involve all ingredients.
garnish: Garnish with sprigs of mint and slice of lime.

name: pina colada
method:
Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender,
pour into a large glass and serve with straws.

Note:
Historically a few drops of fresh lime juice was added to taste. 4 slices of fresh pineapple can be used instead of juice
garnish: Garnish with a slice of pineapple with a cocktail cherry.

name: porn star martini
ingredients: 50 ml Champagne to serve on the side
method:
Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double strain into a large chilled cocktail glass.

Accompany with a shot of champagne.
garnish: Garnish with passion fruit cup and sugar.

name: tequila sunrise
method:
Pour tequila and orange juice directly into highball glass filled with ice cubes.
Add the grenadine syrup to create chromatic effect (sunrise), do not stir.
garnish: Garnish with half orange slice or an orange zest.

name: aperol spritz
method:
Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice.
Stir gently.

NOTE:
There are other versions of the Spritz that use Campari, Cynar or Select instead of Aperol.
garnish: Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: campari spritz
method:
Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice.
Stir gently.

NOTE:
There are other versions of the Spritz that use Campari, Cynar or Select instead of Aperol.
garnish: Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: hugo
method:
Lightly clap the mint leaves between your hands and place in a large wine glass filled with ice. Add St-Germain, pour in elderflower syrup and Prosecco, and top with soda water.
Stir very gently.

Note:
Reduce St-Germain if you prefer a drier drink, or add a squeeze of lime for more acidity.
garnish: Garnish with a sprig of mint and a lime wheel.

name: vanilla sunset spritz
ingredients: 40 ml Passion Fruit Juice or Passoa
method:
Fill a tall glass with ice. Add vanilla vodka, Aperol, and passion fruit juice (or Passoa). Stir gently, then top with soda water.

Note:
If using Passoa instead of juice, add a splash of lime juice if available.
garnish: Garnish with an orange slice or a piece of passion fruit.

name: green monkey negroni
method:
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well chilled and strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube.

Note:
The Pisang softens the bitterness and adds a subtle banana tropical note.

name: coco tequila sunrise twist
method:
Shake tequila, pineapple juice, orange juice, and coconut purée with ice until smooth. Strain into a tall glass filled with ice, then top with a splash of soda water.

Note:
If the drink becomes too creamy, add a bit more soda. Adding a squeeze of lime (if you have it) will brighten the cocktail significantly.
garnish: Garnish with a pineapple wedge or an orange slice.

name: elderflower ruby sunset
method:
Combine Tequila, Campari, Elderflower Syrup, and Lime Juice in a shaker with ice. Shake until well chilled. Double strain into a chilled wine glass or coupe. Top with Prosecco.

Note:
The Campari provides a brilliant ruby color and balancing bitterness to the floral sweetness of the elderflower.
garnish: Garnish with a thin lime wheel and a few edible flower petals.
